mapper.insert: INSERT INTO loreCrad( lorePointId, language, area, questionType, difficultyLevel, titleText, titleVoiceSrc, titleAutoPlay, questionText, questionVoiceSrc, questionAutoPlay, questionImages, answers, createTime, createId )VALUES( #{lorePointId}, #{language}, #{area}, #{questionType}, #{difficultyLevel}, #{titleText}, #{titleVoiceSrc}, #{titleAutoPlay}, #{questionText}, #{questionVoiceSrc}, #{questionAutoPlay}, #{questionImages}, #{answers}, #{createTime}, #{createId} )
mapper.select: select t.id,t.lorePointId ,b.lorePointName ,t.questionType, t.difficultyLevel,t.titleText,t.questionText,t.questionImages,t.answers from lorecrad t ,lorepoint b where t.lorePointId=b.id and t.id=#{id}

select t.id,t.lorePointId ,b.lorePointName ,t.questionType, t.difficultyLevel,t.titleText,t.questionText,t.questionImages,t.answers from lorecrad t ,lorepoint b where t.lorePointId=b.id and t.lorePointId=#{lorePointId}
mapper.update: UPDATE lorecrad set language=#{language}, area=#{area}, questionType=#{questionType}, difficultyLevel=#{difficultyLevel}, titleText=#{titleText}, titleVoiceSrc=#{titleVoiceSrc}, titleAutoPlay=#{titleAutoPlay}, questionText=#{questionText}, questionVoiceSrc=#{questionVoiceSrc}, questionAutoPlay=#{questionAutoPlay}, questionImages=#{questionImages}, answers=#{answers}, isOpen=#{isOpen}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, updateId=#{updateId} where id=#{id}
UPDATE lorepoint t set t.number=t.number+1 WHERE t.id=#{id}
UPDATE lorepoint t ,lorecrad b set t.number=t.number-1 WHERE b.id=#{id} AND t.id =b.lorePointId
